snippet: Charles Nathan, a former co-chairman of the global mergers and acquisitions practice at the law firm Latham & Watkins, has joined the communications advisory firm RLM Finsbury as a partner. Stephen Labaton, a former New York Times reporter, is also...
abstract: Charles Nathan, a former co-chairman of the global mergers and acquisitions practice at the law firm Latham & Watkins, has joined the communications advisory firm RLM Finsbury as a partner. Stephen Labaton, a former New York Times reporter, is also joining the firm as a partner.
